Never have been able to find the option anywhere, so is this not possible or am I just blind?

Sometimes I check out a game and want to review it, but feel like I should hold off just in case the author addresses some of the issues it had. ([url=http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/2ylgofnyxkk36g96qffrwg/yonder:37pc8e3j]Yonder[/url:37pc8e3j] being the most dramatic recent example.) I keep thinking it would be REALLY helpful to be able to revise a review and increase the rating if someone posts a game with problems but then later improves it.
